name: CTRL and Roll
description:
Poops got Out of Control — 'CTRL' to clean them up!Made in 24 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam (I had only 1 free day)
Theme: Out of Control
============   How To Play  ============* Hold 'Left Ctrl' — choose direction* Press I/J/K/L (while holding 'CTRL') — change direction          J — go to the left           I — go upwards           L - go to the right           K - go downwards* Release 'Ctrl' — go to the chosen direction============   Goal  ============ *  Clean up the Poops to get additional PIECES of PAPER * Collect the toilet rolls to get additional 'CTRL' CLICKS * By releasing the 'CTRL' button, you SPEND one 'CTRL' click  * When the remaining number of pieces of paper drops to ZERO/you HIT the wall, the Game Is Over!============   Numbers  ============*  RED number above the PLAYER shows the REMAINING number of 'Ctrl' clicks* RED number above the TOILET ROLL shows the number of additional 'Ctrl' clicks you can get* YELLOW  number in the LEFT BOTTOM CORNER shows the REMAINING number of your pieces of paper* YELLOW  number above the POOP  shows the number of additional pieces of paper you can get============   SUPPORT  ============1.  AtymTima Games™ — https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOC6KNeqE7RAaU0kp_Z157w?sub_confirmation=12.  More games from AtymTima Games™— https://atymtima.itch.io/no-time-to-shine3.  For feedback and questions — atymtima.games@gmail.com4.   Leave a comment on the itch.io webpage of this game!5.  Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/atymtima/
